q1: Why is a team like Barcelona always so dominant in league play?
a1: They have strong chemistry. A variety of nationalities so each player feels secure and at home. They also sign players with the most potential and have hardworking players, such as Paulinho.
a2: The captain of the Messi team
q3: Barcelona will win against Madrid in their next game together.
a3: I agree, Barcelona typically dominates Madrid.
q4: Will they have a good defense?
q5: They tend to keep passing even if it doesn't work
a5: Messi needs to shoot as much as Ronaldo, instead of passing all the time.
